posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302818307', 'Rent: $6,864 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: Now or August', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'FEATURES', '10Ft - Ceilings', 'Conference rooms', 'Elevator', 'EV Charging stations', 'Fitness Center', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Indoor entertainment kitchen with seating', 'Indoor pet relief area', 'Landscaped outdoor terrace', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Living room with fireplace and television', 'Modern Bath', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Open-style kitchens', 'Private Balcony', 'Quartz countertops Tile backsplash', 'Refrigerator', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Sun room with shuffleboard table', 'Views of the Charles River, Kendall Square, Back Bay, Downtown, and Broad Canal', 'Walk-In Closet', 'Waterfall island counter*', 'Another Level Realty LLC', 'Call Now', '617 888 6265', "IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME.", 'I HAVE THOUSANDS OF OTHER PROPERTIES.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable, it is represented subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.']
